events.name: A Peek Into Industry 4.0 - Trends, Challenges and Solutions
events.description:
More details and online registration at: http://bit.ly/2cgQm8Q
Discover how you can be faster, more precise and more efficient in your work to meet the challenges of the current industrial revolution.
As your technology and service partner, we invite you to join us for a day to equip yourself with the right skills, training and the relevant hardware and software knowledge to help you get there.
The User Meeting covers product and technology updates from ZEISS, service topics and informative technical subjects that will definitely be of interest to you. We have specially tailored this year's agenda based on the feedback we have gathered through an anonymous survey conducted a few months ago. Also new in this year's User Meeting is the choice of supplementing a comprehensive workshop together with our experienced application specialists and engineers on the latest ZEISS products and how to better utilize them for increased efficiency at work. 
We hope that you will attend the User Meeting and share the enthusiasm for a future filled with innovation unfolding in front of us.
More details and online registration at: http://bit.ly/2cgQm8Q
events.location: Carl Zeiss Pte Ltd, 50 Kaki Bukit Place #01-01, Singapore 415926

events.name: FREE eCommerce Training Workshop
events.description:
Escape the Rat race of life and start making passive income!Our system enables you to promote online business in ways no other system can!
Get paid weekly without quitting your day job!
This 3 hours workshop is FULLY SPONSORED by us and there will not be any fee involved.
________________________________
WHAT YOU WILL LEARN : - The secrets to generating 12 million dollars in the first year of running an online business WITHOUT inventory, handling logistics, hiring staff and without quitting your day job.
- How you can also achieve it too by following our proven online strategies.
- How to turn your 4 figure income to 5 – 6 figure income EVERY MONTH.
Through our training, we will get new apprentices to be trained to run your online business together with us and eventually become Future Internet Millionaires.
As this is only a FREE training done out of good will and spare time, it could be the LAST CHANCE to experience in learning personally from a Millionaire who created wealth from the internet.
________________________________
TAKE NOTE : If you are wondering whether this seminar is about forex trading or some get rich quick gimmicks? It is NOT!
It is a legitimate and easy way of setting up your very own Internet business to generate the income you want for you to start achieving Financial Freedom.

Please SMS Aisah - 82984274, a day before the event to confirm seats. Thank you!

events.name: UnaCafe - Introducing the SIGFOX network for connecting IoT devices nationwide
events.description:
Join us every Friday afternoon to learn about the low-power, long-range SIGFOX network for IoT devices, rolling out nationwide now. Attendees will also become members of the UnaMakers programme for collaborating online with UnaBiz and our solution partners.
About UnaBizUnaBiz is the exclusive operator of the SIGFOX IoT network in Singapore and Taiwan. We will deploy a nation-wide IoT network in Singapore to enable a Low-Power Wide Area Network (LPWAN) that is extremely low power, long range, cost effective and simple to use for compatible devices.This network will be an open and public network, giving equal access to qualified IoT channel partners, service providers, SMEs, large enterprises, government agencies and educational institutions. * Operates on the 920-922 MHz frequency range* Long range covering the whole of Singapore * Low device and subscription costs so that it can be deployed pervasively* Wireless and low power so that it can be installed and maintained easily on a very large scale* Doesn’t need pairing or SIM card so it can be connected easilyAbout UnaMakerUnaMaker is an online technical forum where UnaBiz Pte Ltd communicates with our solution partners. Its objectives are:• UnaBiz to share technology on SIGFOX network, devices, software, source code, and use cases with partners• Online technical and use cases discussion with Partners on IoT solution development
Speakers
Jonathan Tan, VP, Sales and Business Development, UnaBiz
Lee Lup Yuen, Principal Consultant, UnaBiz
events.location: Crown Coffee, CT Hub 2, Level 1, 114 Lavender St, Singapore 338729

events.name: TGIFHacks #54 - Open source drones in everyday life
events.description:
Garuda Robotics will come down this week to give a talk! 

Nicholas from Garuda Robotics will be sharing on how to use open source UAV technology to solve real world problems. He believes that open source movement enables everybody to kickstart their UAV journey with the correct platforms and frameworks, which he will be sharing with few examples used by Garuda Robotics in their solutions.
events.location: The Nest Theatre @ Innovation Centre, , Singapore 63
